name: Yuhha: Stolen Treasure (Demo)
description:
If you fan of retro style platformers you should help Yuhha to find out who stole his treasure and waking him!

● 15 hardcore vertical levels (5 different stages) (demo contains whole first stage)
● Each level brings something new! (enemies, obstacles, mechanics)
● Try to find secret rooms! (one per level)
● Achieve higher run score (from zero to ten) and better run time (use built-in timer)
● Classic color palette (8-bit consoles)
● Retro 8:7 aspect ratio of gameplay part of the screen (gameplay + interface = 16:9)

Add Yuhha: Stolen Treasure to Steam Wishlist list!
